00037 void do_exit(int error)
00038 {
00045   if (h)
00046   {
00047     print_diag("pcan_topics");
00048     CAN_Close(h);
00049 
00050   }
00051   printf("pcan_topics: finished (%d).\n\n", error);
00052   exit(error);
00053 }

00056 // the opposite: lookup for device string out of HW_.. constant
00057 char *getNameOfInterface(int nType)
00058 {
00065   switch (nType)
00066   {
00067     case HW_PCI:            return "pci";
00068     case HW_ISA_SJA:        return "isa";
00069     case HW_DONGLE_SJA:     return "sp";
00070     case HW_DONGLE_SJA_EPP: return "epp";
00071     case HW_USB:            return "usb";
00072     case HW_USB_PRO:        return "usbpro";
00073     case HW_PCCARD:         return "pccard";
00074     
00075     default:                return "unknown";
00076   }
00077 }
00078 
00079 // print out device and channel diagnostics
00080 void print_diag(const char *prgName)
00081 {
00088   int err;
00089   TPDIAG diag;
00090   
00091   err = LINUX_CAN_Statistics(h, &diag);
00092   if (err)
00093     printf("%s: can't read diagnostics, error %d!\n", prgName, err);
00094   else      
00095   {
00096     printf("%s: type            = %s\n",              prgName, getNameOfInterface(diag.wType));
00097     if ((diag.wType == HW_USB) || (diag.wType == HW_USB_PRO))
00098     {
00099       printf("             Serial Number   = 0x%08x\n", diag.dwBase);
00100       printf("             Device Number   = %d\n",     diag.wIrqLevel);
00101     }
00102     else
00103     {
00104       printf("             io              = 0x%08x\n", diag.dwBase);
00105       printf("             irq             = %d\n",     diag.wIrqLevel);
00106     }
00107     printf("             count of reads  = %d\n",     diag.dwReadCounter);
00108     printf("             count of writes = %d\n",     diag.dwWriteCounter);
00109     printf("             count of errors = %d\n",     diag.dwErrorCounter);
00110     printf("             count of irqs   = %d\n",     diag.dwIRQcounter);
00111     printf("             last CAN status = 0x%04x\n", diag.wErrorFlag);
00112     printf("             last error      = %d\n",     diag.nLastError);
00113     printf("             open paths      = %d\n",     diag.nOpenPaths);
00114     printf("             driver version  = %s\n",     diag.szVersionString);    
00115   }  
00116 }
